advancedsearch-desc: Fʋn na niŋ si'em paam ieb linɛ an viki na'ana [[Special:Search]]
advancedsearch-options-pane-preview-list: Nannanna zi'el banɛ ka ba dɔlisi ied
advancedsearch-field-subpageof: Lak-si'eba banɛ bɛ lak kaŋa ni
advancedsearch-field-inlanguage: Lakir banɛ bɛ pian'ad nwa ni
advancedsearch-field-filew: Faal labisim zem si'em pigizil ni
advancedsearch-field-fileh: Faali dʋʋ agɔla si'em pigizil bama ni
advancedsearch-help-plain: ;Pa'alʋg :Fʋn na ied pian'abama pian'azutin la bɛɛ sɔb la ni. ;Baŋim bʋmbama nwa :* Fʋ na tun'e kpɛn'ɛs Pian'ababʋg kpɛla. :* Pian'agʋda nɛ sɔb banɛ ka' sɔb bielim bɛɛ kallɛ (ya'a ka kɔlɔm nɛ kɔnma) kʋ paasɛ. :* Fʋn ied si'ela bʋn ayinne bɛɛ ayi' tun'e kae li nii. :* Ban tun'e paas bʋnsieba pian'ʋk-giŋin. Nwɛnnɛ: Fʋ ya'a kpɛn'ɛs ''tuurin kaa'', ieb la mɛ tun'e paas ''tuurin kaanam''. Pian'ad wʋsa mɔr bam paasid si'elnam pian'ʋk-giŋin si'em. ;Lakir dinɛ sʋŋid :[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:CirrusSearch#Full_text_search Full text search] ;Syntax-equivalent in the normal search :sesame street car
advancedsearch-help-phrase: ;Pa'alʋg :Fʋ ya'a ied sɔb-biela banɛ bɛɛ ba kɔn'. Pian'agʋnda pʋ paasida. ;Baŋim bʋmbama nwa :(fʋ ya'a niŋid kotesin maks din ka li nar, gɔsim nwɛnnɛm banɛ bɛ nwa) :* Wɛligim ieb pian'agima la nɛ vʋ'ʋsim zanbin bɛɛ paalbil nwɛnnɛ "Gbis wala", "m zua!". :* Pian'agʋda nɛ sɔb banɛ ka' sɔb bielim bɛɛ kallɛ (ya'a ka kɔlɔm nɛ kɔnma) pʋ paasɛ. :* Search is not case-sensitive. :* Word stemming is not applied. ;Help page :[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:CirrusSearch#Words.2C_phrases.2C_and_modifiers Words, phrases, and modifiers] ;Syntax-equivalent in the normal search :Words in quotation marks, for example "Begin at the beginning".
advancedsearch-help-or: ;Pa'alʋg :Li ya'a bɔɔd din pɔɔd si'em, di nar ye ieb zi'ela yinne paas lakirin la. ;Lakir sʋŋsim :[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:CirrusSearch#Words.2C_phrases.2C_and_modifiers Words, phrases, and modifiers] ;Syntax-taaba zaŋi ken ieb wʋsa ni :Pian'ad ya maali OR li tensʋk nwɛnɛ Laptop OR Notebook.
advancedsearch-help-not: ;Pa'alʋg :Da paas lakir banɛ ka pian'abama bɛ iebin la. ;Baŋim dinɛ dɔl nwa :* Azaŋ bʋnsieba paas pian'ʋkʋn tun'e niŋ. Nwɛnɛ: Li ya'a anɛ ''lɔr'' ka ba kpɛn'ɛsɛɛ, ieb la mɛ tun'e paas ''lɔrnam''. Buudi pian'ad wʋsa mɔri suobanɛ ka ba zaŋi bʋnsieba paas pian'ʋkʋn. ;Sʋŋir lakir :[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:CirrusSearch#Words.2C_phrases.2C_and_modifiers Words, phrases, and modifiers] ;Syntax-equivalent in the normal search :Words with - before them, for example -elephant.
advancedsearch-help-intitle: ;Pa'alʋg :Ieb banɛ mɔr yɛlzut linɛ ka pian'ʋk kaŋa paas ;Baŋim bʋmbama nwa :* Ieb la paasnɛ ban na pa'alif fʋn na gɔs zin'isieba. :* Azaŋ bʋnsieba paas pian'akʋn tun'e niŋ ala. Nwɛnɛ: Ya'a anɛ ''lɔr'' ka ba kpɛn'ɛs, ieb la mɛ tun'e paas ''lɔrnam''. Azaŋ bʋnsieba paas pian'kʋn la anɛ buudi woo niŋid si'em. ;Sʋŋsim lakir :[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:CirrusSearch#Intitle_and_incategory Intitle and incategory] ;Syntax-equivalent in the normal search :Words with intitle: before them like intitle:queen.
advancedsearch-help-subpageof: ;Pa'alʋg :Searches for pages that are subpages of this page. ;Be aware of the following :* You can only search for subpages of one page at a time. :* Don’t forget to enable the namespaces you want to limit your search to in the namespace filter. :* Do not include the namespace in front of the page name like this: {{ns:project}}:Redirect. ;Help page :[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:CirrusSearch#subpageof Subpageof] ;Syntax-equivalent in the normal search :subpageof: followed by a page name like subpageof:Redirect. Use double quotes if the parent page contains spaces: subpageof:"Requests for comment".
advancedsearch-help-filew: ;Pa'alʋg :Zin'ibama kɛtnɛ ka fʋ nyaŋidi pa'an faal la labisim an si'em. ;Baŋim bʋmbama nwa yɛla :* Dina zi'enɛ tis faal banɛ labisim nɛ ba gɔla dʋʋsir nwɛnɛ sininam nɛ footonam. ;Sʋŋir lakir :[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Sʋŋir:CirrusSearch#File_measures Filemeasures] ;Sintas-linɛ nwaas nɛ iebnɛ :Kal banɛ mɔr filew ba tuon nwɛnɛ filew:>800.
advancedsearch-sort-last-edit-asc: Dɛmisʋg dabisir - dinɛ yuug bɛ zugin
advancedsearch-sort-last-edit-desc: Dɛmisʋg dabsir - Dinɛ niŋ nannanna bɛ zugin
advancedsearch-sort-create-timestamp-asc: Maalʋg dabisir - dinɛ yuug bɛ zugin
advancedsearch-sort-create-timestamp-des: Maalʋg dabsir - dinɛ niŋid nannanna bɛ zugin
advancedsearch-sort-preview-last-edit-as: Dɛmisʋg dinɛ yuolim maal ka pɔɔd
advancedsearch-sort-preview-create-times: dinɛ yuolim maali niŋ la pɔɔd
advancedsearch-namespaces-remember: Tiem gaŋir la daasi'er ieb yela
advancedsearch-namespaces-pane-preview-l: Nannanna yʋda banɛ tʋm zin'igi nwa filtanamin
advancedsearch-preference-help: Tuon Ieb kɛtnɛ ka li bɛllim aan di Kɔn': Lakir Ieb. Dina kɛtnɛ ka fʋ nyaŋidi ied iebanɛ bɛɛ ba kɔn' hali fʋ ya'a zi' ieb la sintaksɛ. Di mɛ ti'akid fʋn na niŋ si'em gaŋ yʋda zin'is.
advancedsearch-preference-disable: Da pa'al Tuon Ieb bʋn fʋ ya'a mɔr Ieb linɛ bɛɛ di Kɔn' la tʋmma
